title: 28: Dante and his Comedy
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: We introduce you to Dante in this episode and give you a guide to understanding his best known work. Oh, also, it's a little bit about Hell, which is fun.
itunes:author: Hanenburg, Beezleburg, Donaldburg
itunes:subtitle: It's only a little funny, actually
itunes:summary: We introduce you to Dante in this episode and give you a guide to understanding his best known work. Oh, also, it's a little bit about Hell, which is fun.
